column1: Note: Orig location was 0.75 miles to East of Horncastle Stn and 0.25 miles South of Church.
Note: Gauge moved 29/7/1931 approx 400 yds NE although move was considered same station at the time.
Note: Gauge moved 29/4/1937 approx 800 yds SW to Langton Hill location, although move was considered same station at the time.
